p: 293T cells and MDCK cells were seeded into white, flat-bottom, 96-well CulturPlates (PerkinElmer) respectively at densities of 20,000 and 10,000 cells/well, respectively. For toxicity screening, cells were treated with indicated compounds at 20 Î¼M, while for determination of CC 50s, cells were treated with increasing concentrations of test compounds.
